contentrichtext.text: <noinclude>{{../doc}} {{divhide|Staging area}} ==Images== Use only ONE image at a time <gallery> File:Song Modi.jpg|Emperor Bing of Song File:Pluto_and_its_satellites_(2005)_without_labels.jpg|Pluto and its moons File:Sydney Opera Harbour Bridge.jpg|Sydney Harbour Bridge File:LunaPark 0135.JPG|Sydney Harbour Bridge File:Cavelier de la salle.jpg|Robert Cavelier de La Salle File:Attack on carrier USS Franklin 19 March 1945.jpg|Aircraft carrier USS Franklin being attacked File:Tuskegee airman poster.jpg|U.S. war bonds poster featuring a Tuskegee Airman </gallery> ==Ineligible== {|class="wikitable" |- !Blurb !Reason |- | [[1687]] – The search for the [[Base level|mouth]] of the [[Mississippi River]] led by French explorer '''[[René-Robert Cavelier, Sieur de La Salle]]''' ended with a [[mutiny]] and his murder in present-day [[Texas]]. | refimprove |- | [[1863]] – [[American Civil War]]: On her maiden voyage from Scotland, where she was built, the [[Confederate States Navy]] steamer '''''[[SS Georgiana|Georgiana]]''''', reputed to be one of the most powerful in the fleet, was damaged and sunk in the [[Charleston, South Carolina]], harbor. | unreferenced section |- | [[1921]] – [[Italian Fascism|Italian Fascists]] shot at a group of children from the '''''[[Parenzana]]''''' train, killing two of them, maiming two, and injuring three others. | refimprove |- | [[1945]] – [[World War II]]: A single Japanese aircraft bombed the American [[aircraft carrier]] '''[[USS Franklin (CV-13)|USS ''Franklin'']]''', killing over 700 of her crew and crippling the ship. | refimprove |- | [[1962]] – The '''[[Algerian War]]''' | Tagged with {{tl|refimprove}} |- | [[1982]] – Argentine forces led by [[Alfredo Astiz]] occupied '''[[South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands|South Georgia]]''', precipitating the [[Falklands War]] against the United Kingdom. | refimprove section |} ==Eligible== {{*mp}} [[1279]] – [[Emperor Bing of Song|Emperor Bing]], the '''[[List of emperors of the Song Dynasty|last emperor of the Song Dynasty]]''', dies during the [[Battle of Yamen]], bringing the [[Song Dynasty|dynasty]] to an end after three centuries of rule. {{*mp}} [[1921]] – [[Irish War of Independence]]: About 1,300 British troops '''[[Crossbarry Ambush|attempted to encircle]]''' about 100 [[Irish Republican Army|IRA]] volunteers at [[Crossbarry]] in [[County Cork]]. {{*mp}} [[1932]] – The '''[[Sydney Harbour Bridge]]''', a major landmark in [[Sydney]], Australia, was formally opened. {{*mp}} [[1941]] – The '''[[Tuskegee Airmen]]'''<!-- ''(poster pictured)''-->, the first all-[[African American]] unit of the [[United States Army Air Corps]], was activated. {{*mp}} [[1954]] – American [[Pool (cue sports)|pool]] (pocket billiards) player '''[[Willie Mosconi]]''' set a record of 526 consecutive balls sunk without a miss during an exhibition of [[straight pool]]. {{*mp}} [[1979]] – The American [[cable television]] [[Television network|network]] '''[[C-SPAN]]''', dedicated to airing non-stop coverage of government proceedings and public affairs programming, was launched. {{*mp}} [[1987]] – American [[Televangelism|televangelist]] '''[[Jim Bakker]]''' resigned as the head of ''[[The PTL Club]]'' in the midst of a [[sex scandal]]. {{*mp}} [[1990]] – '''[[Ethnic clashes of Târgu Mureș|Ethnic clashes]]''' between Romanians and Hungarians took place in [[Târgu Mureş]], Romania, leaving several dead and hundreds injured. {{*mp}} [[2008]] – The [[gamma-ray burst]] '''[[GRB 080319B]]''', the farthest object visible to the [[naked eye]], was observed. {{divhide|end}} </noinclude> '''[[March 19]]''': '''[[Saint Joseph's Day]]''' (Western Christianity); '''[[Father's Day]]''' in various countries <div style="float:right;margin-left:0.5em"> [[File:Joan Baez Bob Dylan crop.jpg|Bob Dylan|100x100px]] </div> {{*mp}} [[1808]] – '''[[Charles IV of Spain]]''' abdicated in favour of his son, [[Ferdinand VII of Spain|Ferdinand VII]]<!--not bold, large areas of uncited text-->. {{*mp}} [[1915]] – '''[[Pluto]]''' was photographed for the first time, 15 years before it was officially discovered by [[Clyde Tombaugh]] at the [[Lowell Observatory]]. {{*mp}} [[1962]] – Highly influential American musician '''[[Bob Dylan]]''' ''(pictured)'' released his [[Bob Dylan (album)|eponymous debut album]]<!--not bold, needs more footnotes-->. {{*mp}} [[1978]] – In response to the [[1978 South Lebanon conflict|Israeli invasion of Lebanon]], the [[United Nations]] '''[[United Nations Security Council Resolution 425|called on]]''' Israel to immediately withdraw its forces, and established the [[United Nations Interim Force in Lebanon]]. {{*mp}} [[2011]] – [[Libyan civil war]]: The [[French Air Force]] launched '''[[Opération Harmattan]]''', beginning [[2011 military intervention in Libya|foreign military intervention]] in Libya. </ul> {{SelAnnivFooter|Month=March|Day=19}} <noinclude> [[mzn:ویکی‌پدیا:امروز واری روز/۱۹ مـارچ]] </noinclude>
